column4: Question:  I just install ubuntu and it was working fine but when i create a new user and logoff from the admin, the user login screen it just black...

is there any one that can assiste me with this problem??   I just install ubuntu and it was working fine but when i create a new user and logoff from the admin, the user login screen it just black... i don't want to reinstall ubuntu
How long have you waited? Is there hard drive activity?
the HD led is flashing every 5 to 10 sec
gavilaso I'd wait for 30 minutes and see what happens. Is it 10.04?
Jodaza i'm have wait for around 15min already
I'm not sure, but when I created my standard account, ubuntu wrote zeroes to my entire home folder iirc. It took a loooong while
it is 9.10 the one on their site
But I'm rreally guessing here
ok... i'm new to linux sooo
Jodaza for me it is weired that whe you create a new account and reboot the pc you don't see the login screen it is just in black
You reboot? Not just log out?
now i just log out.. but early this morning i reboot and because it didn't work i re-install ubutu
now i just log out.. but early this morning i reboot and because it didn't work i re-install ubutu
And it's still the same with the new installation?
yes
That sucks :) Is there _really_ a need for more than one account?
it work fine wite the user i create when installed.. but after i create a new user it just give me the black square where you are suppous to see the users list
yes because i'm creating a guest account
with just access to web browser and chat
Have you tried pushing the buttons as usual? Perhaps it's just the graphics that's not showing, but if you hit enter and then the password it works?
YUP!
Well, I'm giving up :) good luck finding someone who can give you more advise :)
thanks for your time!!
